title: Transferring meant to be out?
body:
[Here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/N1ihwjZG-account-transfers-half-off-for-a-limited-time)
There it says they're back up with 8.2, 8.2 is out and there is no transfer option

replies.body: It doesn't look like 8.2 has dropped yet (at least not for all regions). Once it's out in all regions, we can expect transfers to be turned on again.
